General.Name: Suzhou Goldengreen Technologies Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Goldengreen Technologies Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, manufactures, and sells laser organic photo-conductor drum products in China. It also engages in software development and system integration in the field of information security, focusing on the research and development, production and sales of information security, and confidential technology and products. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Suzhou, China.
